headline: Albemarle (ALB) Valuation in Focus After Executive Shakeup and Strategic Restructuring
summary: Albemarle (ALB) just shook up its C-suite, making moves that are hard for any investor to ignore. With longtime executive Netha N. Johnson stepping down as Chief Operations Officer and Mark M. Mummert stepping up to lead an integrated operations, supply chain, and capital function, the company says it aims to boost agility and efficiency. This kind of internal restructuring does not happen every day and often signals bigger shifts for a company’s future. It is no surprise that investors are...
